phrases: The world has become a superhuman society,
and about 80 of the world's population now has some kind of special trait.
In this world swirling with chaos,
the profession that everyone once dreamed about and admired
Heroes of justice fighting villains and saving people from distress.
Yes, this is the story of how I became the greatest hero.
The second round of the YOU.A. sports festival first-year stage is...
A cavalry battle with the top 42 from the qualifier!
Izuku Midoriya, who placed first in the qualifier, is worth ten million points!
It is survival of the fittest, with a chance for those at the bottom to overthrow the top!
Bakugo and Todoroki are not the only ones who see you as a rival.
I will be taking that now.
It was a good plan, so I joined the team even though it was you.
When did you lose your headband?
But now, there is nothing left to lose!
We are going to steal the points from those two teams with everything we have got!
I thought we would not have a confrontation until later in this contest.
He seems to think highly of you, Midoriya.
Only half the time is left!
Yaoyorozu, prepare to guard us and conduct electricity.
I know what I have to do!
It is not just one group coming for us!
Sorry, but you will just have to bear it.
Todoroki took care of that crowd of teams in an instant!
He froze them after Kaminari's shock stopped them...
I guess it should be expected,
but he took into account how a lot of people avoided it in the obstacle course.
I might as well take these.
Oh no, it is too strong!
Yaoyoruzu's Creation is too hard to deal with!
if it had been sunlight, Dark Shadow would have been ripped apart.
In any case, I want you to devote yourself to defense.
You do not have to attack.
My Quirk's offensive ability increases the darker it is,
but it becomes fierce and difficult to control.
On the other hand, under sunlight, it becomes possible to control,
but its offense becomes below average.
To tell me I did not have to attack with my Quirk without knowing that...
It is a very unique choice, under the circumstances.
I leave it to you, Midoriya.
As long as he keeps discharging electricity,
Team Midoriya has nowhere left to go!
They do not know that, do they?
The only person I have told about this weakness is Koda, at USJ,
and he is a man of few words.
If they do not know about it, then we can use it to hold them back.
No matter what, we will hang on to the ten million!
You are famous, are not you?
As the victim of the sludge incident!
About how it feels to be attacked by villains once a year.
You will be the same as him.
It would not become a hero.
Besides, do not you often hear
about heroes who get done in by villains who want revenge?
If you do not calm down, we will not be able to get the points back!
We are seriously counting on you!
Bakugo, someone has the same Quirk as you, too?
of anyone he touches as much as he wants for five minutes.
He cannot use two at the same time, though!
Well, even an idiot can figure it out, huh?
Monoma, we just have to keep from getting caught now.
With this many points, we will definitely make it into the top four!
I will melt it with my Quirk!
We have got zero points right now!
Oh, do not get mad at me.
You are the one who provoked us, right?
What did you say for the pledge again?
Oh well, you have done enough for today!
I will take an indisputable first place!
Todoroki made it so he would have the
ten million to himself to seize in an instant!
At least, that is what I thought five minutes ago!
But unbelievably, Midoriya's been able to
keep away in that cramped space for five minutes!
He can see right through you.
He is keeping his distance, staying on the left side.
At this rate, if I want to freeze them over the
shortest distance possible, I will get Iida.
And if he keeps moving like this,
I will do myself in if I freeze indiscriminately.
-And Tokoyami can defend against Kaminari's electricity.
Everyone, there is less than a minute left.
You will not be able to use me after this.
Make sure you get it, Todoroki.
Iida, if you could accelerate that fast, then show us in the prelims!
By forcing the torque and rotations to increase, I created an explosive power.
With the recoil, my engine stalls after a while, though.
It is a secret move I had not told anyone in class yet.
I told you, did not I, Midoriya?
Offense and defense right at the edge!
Reining that in, Todoroki gets the ten million!
And Midoriya is suddenly left with zero points!
As long as they have Kaminari, we will be at a disadvantage if we attack!
Will not it be safer to try for other points right now?
I do not know how the other points got split up!
We will get it back, Deku!
I will definitely become a hero and make money
and let my parents take it easy.
I leave it to you, Midoriya.
I am carrying all that right now!
With less than a minute left,
He is wrested away the top spot from Midoriya,
who was running away like crazy!
Will these be the top four teams to move on to the next round?!
We might have done a little too well for ourselves.
Anyway, focus on keeping that spot.
As a hero, not to mention as a person, that persistence will-
Do not act on your own, Bakugo!
He can solidify air to form walls or footholds.
The size depends on lung capacity!
Team Bakugo seizes two headbands to move to third place!
The rankings keep changing in the final stages!
It is the passion of youth!
Kendo's been frozen and cannot move.
As long as we defend this one to the death,
I told you to say something if you are going to jump!
But this means we will definitely get through to the next round-
We are going to get an indisputable first place!
Class B's strategy was certainly reasonable and good.
But there is just one thing that is unfortunate...
I could not brace myself enough earlier on my own!
We will get our points back, too, and then go for the ten million!
Lay down a weak dissolving solution in the direction we are going!
Young Bakugo, you understand very well without being told, do not you?
Those who are always aiming for the top,
You did not take the difference in tenacity into consideration, did you?
If he is going to do it, he is going to be thorough!
He is, you know, a perfectionist!
Now, there are only seconds left!
We are going to where Deku and Todoroki are!
I tried to use this power on a person...
Either way, I am not going to hit him.
It hurts, but it is not broken!
He is turned them inside out to hide the point values,
but he took the ten million last and put it on,
so it must be the one on top-
With just eleven seconds left, there is an angry retrieval here, too!
Is not this the wrong headband?
Just in case, we changed the position of the headbands!
Todoroki, get a hold of yourself!
Team Midoriya did not retrieve the ten million points!
That is the end of the second round, the cavalry battle!
Now, let us take a look at the top four teams right away!
Even though we won, it felt like we were skating on thin ice.
Without you, we would not have won.
Well, second place is not bad.
Do you really think that is how he feels?
When did you come from behind?!
Todoroki was clearly shaken by your first attack.
I had hoped to get the ten million points,
but things do not always go as you wish.
I took the one on his head where his guard was the weakest.
Midoriya, this was thanks to the opening you created with your last spurt.
I will not use this to attack.
That is what I had decided, but I was overwhelmed...
At this rate, I will be doing what my old man wants...
Now, we will take an hour's break
for lunch before we start the afternoon festivities!
Hey, Eraser Head, let us go grab food.
Before I knew it, we had zero points, and it was over...
Well, Bakugo just let me join to use against Todoroki's ice,
so I do not know if it reflects my abilities.
Iida, I did not know you had a special move like that!
It has nothing to do with fairness!
I just was not using it as intended.
I wanted to do something that could compete with Midoriya.
It is that manly thing, huh?
Speaking of which, where is that Midoriya?
What did you want to talk about?
The first years have finished their second game.
moving on to the final round have been decided!
But just do not get injured...!
Midoriya, All Might has his eye on you, does not he?
I am not trying to pry about that.
But I am going to beat you.
Todoroki, why are you going so far-
I do not care what you are to All Might...
I will go higher than you.
Even if you say that, there is a reason why I cannot lose!
Next time, The Boy Born with Everything.
The Class A girls will cheer with cheers of cheerleading!
Next time: The Boy Born with Everything
